dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: My name is Outis. I hope you’ll remember it well, Executive Manager.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: A fine morning, Executive Manager! Have you had your breakfast? You seem concerningly feeble; allow me to remind you that it’s important to have a balanced diet!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: An outstanding leader such as yourself should not be subject to the pathetic humiliation of eating all alone! I shall join you at your table!

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: I advise you to sleep early in order to take on tomorrow’s tasks in good shape.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: While I am busy, I am fully willing to pause all my ongoing tasks if you summon me.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: How much are you ready to sacrifice for victory, Executive Manager? How much of yourself are you willing to let go if it means you can win…?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: The absurdity of having to carry out missions with rookies who haven’t even set foot on a real battlefield… Ah, I am most definitely not referring to you, Executive Manager.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Executive Manager? It’s dangerous to go out alone, especially for someone who is as incapable of combat as you are!

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: I will make a sortie right away.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Outis, joining the battle.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Do you have any business with me, Executive Manager?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: As you order.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: The plan is going smoothly.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ugh!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: A sound strategy.

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: Rookies.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: This victory can only be attributed to your excellent planning.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: The fault is mine…

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Splendid as always, Executive Manager!

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: This was 99% your brilliant leadership and 1% my competence!

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: In any case, it’s neither of our faults, Executive Manager.
